thread.section_title: Travelgenio opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Travelgenio | www.travelgenio.es | 2 de 40
thread.title: Noel Studer

author: Noel Studer
title: Noel Studer
text:
I was not informed about a cancelled booking. When I tried to do online Check-In one day before my flight, I suddenly found out, that my flight is deleted. When contacting Travelgenio they told me that they informed me. The Email with the "information" started like this: "WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM YOU THAT YOUR BOOKING HAS BEEN CHARGED AND ISSUED CORRECTLY"
So they told me to talk with the airline company to search another flight, which I would have to pay extra. Finally I found another flight and cancelled my booking on travelgenio. Never again.
